child_refund_reason.title: Confirmation / Meet up details not sent on time/ Incorrect information sent
Failed to follow the schedule / itinerary
Service provider being late (e.g. tour guide, driver)
(Transportation / Tour only) Service / performance issues with driver, guide
(Food & dining only) Dissatisfied food quality / hygienic condition
Maintenance / closure / holidays / private event book-outs / Change of business hours
Service provider no show (e.g. tour guide, driver)
Merchant's local counter's location changed / No staff at the counter
(Activities & tour only) Cancel due to low participants
(Transportation only) Request out of merchant service area
Merchant unable to fulfill the order (e.g. fully booked, out of stock, OP accidentally confirmed the booking)
(Wifi / SIM card) Device/Sim was not delivered correctly
(Hotel only) No avalable room when check in
(Hotel only) Fully booked after making reservation
(Hotel only) Find a better price for the same property
Customer did not pick up the ticket
Forgot to apply promo code / wrong promo code
(Wifi / SIM card) Do not have a credit card for a deposit
(Wifi / SIM card) Failed to follow the instruction
(Hotel only) Change in the number or needs of travelers
(Hotel only) Change of dates or destination
Natural disaster / bad weather / strike / disease / political instability
System error / website or App bug /
Payment gate cannot go through/ Payment error
(Hotel only) Room not match-- auto room mapping error
Unclear / misleading / missing info on website or App or voucher
Booking team internal error (e.g. delay follow up, wrong voucher issued)
CEG  - internal error (e.g. delay follow up, wrong info provided)
(Hotel only) Room not match-- manual room mapping error
Unclear situation - Proofs provided are conflicting/ contradicting with each other

title: The booking has expired when the user completes the payment, and the payment amount should be returned to the user. (Other assets except cash have been automatically returned by the system)
The booking has expired when the user completes the payment, and the payment amount should be returned to the user. (Other assets except cash have been automatically returned by the system)
